@SenThomTillis How about those dads at the border? Please support a bill that will end the cruel policy of forced separation.

@SenThomTillis Why are you not speaking against the cruel actions in separating children from their parents at our border? Doctors and mental health experts know this can cause irreversible psychological trauma to children. Children should not be political pawns.

@SenJohnMcCain You are a maverick and have shown yourself willing to stand against the extremism of this administration. Please speak against the inhumane policies being carried out at the border. Support a bill opposing family separation. History has its eyes on the US.

@SenatorBurr Why are you not speaking against the cruel actions in separating children from their parents at our border? Doctors and mental health experts know this can cause irreversible psychological trauma to children. Children should not be political pawns.

@theatreguy22 Wonderful that you played the Baker, a rich character I suspect you identify with. I played the Witch. “I’m not good, I’m not nice, I’m just right” was my motto for awhile until I mellowed, thankfully. I costumed it and painted lettering. Community theatre you have to do it all! https://t.co/OIYWNQNrez

@theatreguy22 Thanks for sharing. I thought I’d seen you write about that before. The themes resonated with me as well. I taught it for years in my English classes, where we had great debates about its moral issues. And it’s possibly my favorite directing venture.
